section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to XGirl.fr, a platform for adult entertainment service listings. By accessing and using our website, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any of the terms, we ask that you do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Age Requirements
section2.content: This website is strictly prohibited for individuals under the age of 18 or the legal age of majority in your country of residence. By using the site, you declare that you are of legal age and take full responsibility for accessing the content.

section3.title: 3. Permitted Use
section3.content:
3.1. The site is intended exclusively for the publication of adult entertainment service advertisements that comply with the current legislation of the European Union and the advertiser's country.
3.2. The publication of any advertisement involving illegal activities, sexual exploitation, human trafficking, child pornography, coercion, or any other practice contrary to the law is prohibited.
3.3. The user is responsible for the content of the advertisements and must ensure that all information provided is true and does not infringe the rights of third parties.

section4.title: 4. Responsibility and Moderation
section4.content:
4.1. XGirl.fr is not responsible for the content of advertisements published by users but reserves the right to remove or modify any advertisement that violates these Terms and Conditions.
4.2. We have implemented moderation mechanisms to ensure that the advertisements published comply with the law and site policies.

section5.title: 5. Data Protection and Privacy
section5.content:
5.1. The site adheres to the guidelines of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union.
5.2. The personal information provided by users will be protected in accordance with our Privacy Policy and will not be shared with third parties without due consent.

section6.title: 6. Payments and Subscriptions
section6.content:
6.1. Some site services may require payment. All financial transactions will be processed securely.
6.2. In the event of subscription cancellation, no refunds will be issued for payments already made unless required by law.

section7.title: 7. Sanctions and Account Deletion
section7.content:
7.1. XGirl.fr reserves the right to suspend or delete user accounts that violate these Terms and Conditions without prior notice.
7.2. If you identify any illegal or irregular activity on the site, please contact our support team immediately.

section8.title: 8. Final Provisions
section8.content:
8.1. These Terms and Conditions may be changed at any time. We recommend that users periodically review this document.
8.2. Continued use of the site after changes to the Terms and Conditions constitutes acceptance of the modifications.
section8.contact: If you have any questions, please contact our support team at info@xgirl.fr.
